nodes.text: This battle droid was stationed on the bridge of a Separatist supply ship stationed above the planet of Umbara during the Battle of Umbara.

When the Separatist supply ship was infiltrated by three Galactic Republic clone troopers flying captured Umbaran starfighters, this B1-Series battle droid was alerted that the starships were actually piloted by clones and not Umbarans and informed the T-series tactical droid which was in command. The droid later informed the command droid that the clones were heading to the main reactor and turned out the ray shields. This battle droid was destroyed along with the supply ship when the clones destroyed the ship's reactor.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood.
